channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-9137] Add Tag dictionary in WAL compression
item.description: We can add tag dictionary like we have one for rowdictionary, familydictionary. But this has to be done after stabilizing HBASE-7391.
item.summary: Add Tag dictionary in WAL compression

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
+1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12605437/HBASE-9137.patch
against trunk revision .

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

+1 tests included. The patch appears to include 16 new or modified tests.

+1 hadoop1.0. The patch compiles against the hadoop 1.0 profile.

+1 hadoop2.0. The patch compiles against the hadoop 2.0 profile.

+1 javadoc. The javadoc tool did not generate any warning messages.

+1 javac. The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

+1 findbugs. The patch does not introduce any new Findbugs (version 1.3.9) warnings.

+1 release audit. The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

+1 lineLengths. The patch does not introduce lines longer than 100

+1 site. The mvn site goal succeeds with this patch.

+1 core tests. The patch passed unit tests in .

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/7397//testReport/
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/7397//artifact/trunk/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-prefix-tree.html
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/7397//artifact/trunk/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-client.html
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/7397//artifact/trunk/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-common.html
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/7397//artifact/trunk/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-protocol.html
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/7397//artifact/trunk/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-server.html
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/7397//artifact/trunk/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-hadoop1-compat.html
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/7397//artifact/trunk/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-examples.html
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/7397//artifact/trunk/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-thrift.html
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/7397//artifact/trunk/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-hadoop-compat.html
Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/7397//console

This message is automatically generated.
Can you post an rb?

+ * Context that holds the dictionary for Tag compression and doing the compress/uncompress. This

+ * will be used for compressing tags while writing into HFile and WALs.

As far as I can tell, TagCompressionContext is only used in WAL related classes. How is HFile related ?


+  public TagCompressionContext(Class<? extends Dictionary> dictType) throws SecurityException,

Is wildcard necessary above ?


+    int endOffset = pos + tagsLength;

+    while (pos < endOffset) {

Add assertion that pos < endOffset before the while loop ?

There're 3 variants for uncompressTags(). Can you add javadoc for them explaining use case ?

More comments to follow once patch posted on rb.
The same logic would be used in Hfile tag compression also. That is the reason for that java doc. When that patch comes in the javadoc would make more sense.

Yes as Ram said the patch for the tag compression in HFile along with Data block encoding will come in another jira. There also same Context will get used.
I will post in RB. Well this patch looks bigger but actually not. I have moved some classes from hbase-server to hbase-common. (Dictionary , LRUDictionary etc) Just saying.
https://reviews.apache.org/r/14362/
Patch on RB. Can I get some reviews. Thanks. .

As far as I can tell, TagCompressionContext is only used in WAL related classes. How is HFile related ?

Removed HFile from the comment as of now. Will add when submitting patch for tag compression in HFiles

Is wildcard necessary above ?

Yes

Add assertion that pos < endOffset before the while loop ?

Yes we can. Done

There're 3 variants for uncompressTags(). Can you add javadoc for them explaining use case ?

Removed keeping just one. Other were used by tag compression in HFiles. Will add with that patch. Added javadoc for current compress, uncompress methods.

More comments to follow once patch posted on rb.

Thanks for initial look Ted. Expecting review on other parts too.

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12607155/HBASE-9137_V2.patch
against trunk revision .

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

+1 tests included. The patch appears to include 16 new or modified tests.

+1 hadoop1.0. The patch compiles against the hadoop 1.0 profile.

+1 hadoop2.0. The patch compiles against the hadoop 2.0 profile.

-1 site. The patch appears to cause mvn site goal to fail.

+1 core tests. The patch passed unit tests in .

This message is automatically generated.

Patch looks good to me. +1.
Want to test once in a small cluster before commit?

lgtm.

Left some minor comments on the review board.

The changes to ProtobufLog

{Reader,Writer}

leak out tag implementation details into HLog. Should this be something the cell codec can handle? Maybe a CompressionContext can hold more than one dictionary? It looks fine to me otherwise, I'm +0, just wondering if the above can be considered now without too much trouble.
CompressionContext already has more than one dictionary, so +1 on that

This issue was closed as part of a bulk closing operation on 2015-11-20. All issues that have been resolved and where all fixVersions have been released have been closed (following discussions on the mailing list).

customfieldvalues.customfieldvalue: Tag compression will work when WAL compression is enabled. Set "hbase.regionserver.wal.tags.enablecompression" false to disable tag compression in WAL. (This property defaults to true)
